00050     ///////////////////////////////////
00051     // ActorBase class fuctions
00052     ActorBase::ActorBase (String name, String file, String group, World* _World)
00053     {
00054         this->GameWorld = _World;
00055         this->node = this->GameWorld->OgreSceneManager->createSceneNode();
00056         this->GameWorld->OgreSceneManager->getRootSceneNode()->addChild(this->node);
00057         this->MotionState = new internal::PhysMotionState(this->node);
00058         this->Shape = new btEmptyShape();
00059         this->CreateEntity(name, file, group);
00060     }
00061 
00062     ActorBase::~ActorBase ()
00063     {
00064         delete MotionState;
00065         delete Shape;
00066         delete node;
00067         delete entity;
00068     }
00069 
00070     ///////////////////////////////////
00071     // ActorBase Private misc functions
00072     btTriangleMesh* ActorBase::CreateTrimesh()
00073     {
00074         // Get the mesh from the entity
00075         Ogre::MeshPtr myMesh = entity->getMesh();
00076 
00077         // Get the submesh and associated data
00078         Ogre::SubMesh* subMesh = myMesh->getSubMesh(0);
00079         Ogre::IndexData*  indexData = subMesh->indexData;
00080         Ogre::VertexData* vertexData = subMesh->vertexData;
00081 
00082         // Get the position element
00083         const Ogre::VertexElement* posElem = vertexData->vertexDeclaration->findElementBySemantic(Ogre::VES_POSITION);
00084 
00085         // Get a pointer to the vertex buffer
00086         Ogre::HardwareVertexBufferSharedPtr vBuffer = vertexData->vertexBufferBinding->getBuffer(posElem->getSource());
00087 
00088         // Get a pointer to the index buffer
00089         Ogre::HardwareIndexBufferSharedPtr iBuffer = indexData->indexBuffer;
00090 
00091         // Get the number of triangles
00092         unsigned int triCount = indexData->indexCount/3;
00093 
00094         // Allocate space for the vertices and indices
00095         Ogre::Vector3* vertices = new Ogre::Vector3[vertexData->vertexCount];
00096         unsigned long* indices  = new unsigned long[indexData->indexCount];
00097 
00098         // Lock the vertex buffer (READ ONLY)
00099         unsigned char* vertex =   static_cast<unsigned char*>(vBuffer->lock(Ogre::HardwareBuffer::HBL_READ_ONLY));
00100         float* pReal = NULL;
00101         for (size_t j = 0; j < vertexData->vertexCount; ++j, vertex += vBuffer->getVertexSize() )
00102         {
00103             posElem->baseVertexPointerToElement(vertex, &pReal);
00104             Ogre::Vector3 pt(pReal[0], pReal[1], pReal[2]);
00105             vertices[j] = pt;
00106         }
00107         vBuffer->unlock();
00108         size_t index_offset = 0;
00109         bool use32bitindexes = (iBuffer->getType() == Ogre::HardwareIndexBuffer::IT_32BIT);
00110 
00111         // Lock the index buffer (READ ONLY)
00112         unsigned long* pLong = static_cast<unsigned long*>(iBuffer->lock(Ogre::HardwareBuffer::HBL_READ_ONLY));
00113         unsigned short* pShort = reinterpret_cast<unsigned short*>(pLong);
00114 
00115         if (use32bitindexes)
00116         {
00117             for (size_t k = 0; k < triCount*3; ++k)
00118             {
00119                 indices[index_offset++] = pLong[k];
00120             }
00121         }
00122         else
00123         {
00124             for (size_t k = 0; k < triCount*3; ++k)
00125             {
00126                 indices[index_offset++] = static_cast<unsigned long>(pShort[k]);
00127             }
00128         }
00129         iBuffer->unlock();
00130 
00131         // We now have vertices and indices ready to go
00132 
00133         // The Bullet triangle mesh
00134         btTriangleMesh* trimesh = new btTriangleMesh(use32bitindexes);
00135 
00136         // Setup the tri mesh
00137         btVector3 vert0, vert1, vert2;
00138         int i=0;
00139 
00140         // For every triangle
00141         for (unsigned int y=0; y<triCount; y++)
00142         {
00143             // Set each vertex
00144             vert0.setValue(vertices[indices[i]].x, vertices[indices[i]].y, vertices[indices[i]].z);
00145             vert1.setValue(vertices[indices[i+1]].x, vertices[indices[i+1]].y, vertices[indices[i+1]].z);
00146             vert2.setValue(vertices[indices[i+2]].x, vertices[indices[i+2]].y, vertices[indices[i+2]].z);
00147 
00148             // Add it into the trimesh
00149             trimesh->addTriangle(vert0, vert1, vert2);
00150 
00151             // Increase index count
00152             i+=3;
00153         }
00154         delete[] vertices;
00155         delete[] indices;
00156 
00157         return trimesh;
00158     }

00163     void ActorBase::CreateEntity (String name, String file, String group)
00164     {
00165         this->entity = this->GameWorld->OgreSceneManager->createEntity(name, file, group);
00166     }
00167 
00168     void ActorBase::CreateSceneNode ()
00169     {
00170         this->node = this->GameWorld->OgreSceneManager->createSceneNode();
00171     }

00173     ///////////////////////////////////
00174     // ActorBase Private Location Functions
00175 
00176     void ActorBase::SetOgreLocation (Vector3 Location)
00177     {
00178         this->node->setPosition(Location.GetOgreVector3());
00179     }
00180 
00181     Vector3 ActorBase::GetOgreLocation()
00182     {
00183         Vector3 temp;
00184         temp.ExtractOgreVector3(this->node->getPosition());
00185         return temp;
00186     }
00187 
00188     void ActorBase::SetBulletLocation (Vector3 Location)
00189     {
00190         //btTransform* temp = this->CollisionObject->getWorldTransform();
00191         this->CollisionObject->getWorldTransform().setOrigin(Location.GetBulletVector3());
00192     }
00193 
00194     Vector3 ActorBase::GetBulletLocation() const
00195     {
00196         Vector3 temp;
00197         //btTransform trans = this->CollisionObject->getWorldTransform();
00198         temp.ExtractBulletVector3(this->CollisionObject->getWorldTransform().getOrigin());
00199         return temp;
00200     }

00205     void ActorBase::SetOgreOrientation (Quaternion Rotation)
00206     {
00207         this->node->setOrientation(Rotation.GetOgreQuaternion());
00208     }
00209 
00210     void ActorBase::SetBulletOrientation (Quaternion Rotation)
00211     {
00212         this->CollisionObject->getWorldTransform().setRotation(Rotation.GetBulletQuaternion(true));
00213     }

00218     void ActorBase::SetLocation (Real x, Real y, Real z)
00219     {
00220         Vector3 temp(x,y,z);
00221         this->SetLocation(temp);
00222     }
00223 
00224     void ActorBase::SetLocation (Vector3 Place)
00225     {
00226         this->SetBulletLocation(Place);
00227         this->SetOgreLocation(Place);
00228     }
00229 
00230     Vector3 ActorBase::GetLocation() const
00231     {
00232         return this->GetBulletLocation();
00233     }
00234 
00235     void ActorBase::SetInitLocation(Vector3 Location)
00236     {
00237         this->SetBulletLocation(Location);
00238     }

00251         this->SetOrientation(temp);

00254     void ActorBase::SetOrientation (Quaternion Rotation)
00255     {

00257         this->SetOgreOrientation(Rotation);

00260     ///////////////////////////////////
00261     // ActorBase Public Misc Functions
00262 
00263     void ActorBase::AttachToGraphics ()
00264     {
00265         Vector3 temp;
00266         temp = GetBulletLocation();
00267         this->node->setPosition(temp.GetOgreVector3());
00268         this->node->attachObject(this->entity);
00269     }
00270 
00271     void ActorBase::DetachFromGraphics ()
00272     {
00273         this->node->detachObject(this->entity);
00274     }
00275 
00276     std::string ActorBase::GetName () const
00277     {
00278         return this->entity->getName();
00279     }
00280 
00281     void ActorBase::SetActorScaling(Vector3 scaling)
00282     {
00283         this->node->setScale(scaling.GetOgreVector3());
00284         this->Shape->setLocalScaling(scaling.GetBulletVector3());
00285     }

00288     // ActorBase Public Collision flag functions
00289     void ActorBase::SetKinematic()
00290     {
00291         //int x=2;
00292         this->CollisionObject->setCollisionFlags(btCollisionObject::CF_KINEMATIC_OBJECT);
00293     }
00294 
00295     void ActorBase::SetStatic()
00296     {
00297         //int x=1;
00298         this->CollisionObject->setCollisionFlags(btCollisionObject::CF_STATIC_OBJECT);
00299     }

00302 std::ostream& operator << (std::ostream& stream, const phys::ActorBase& x)
00303 {
00304     stream << "[" << x.GetName() << " at:" << x.GetLocation() << "]";
00305     return stream;
00306 }
